articles.title: Cat makes three flights in 24 hours after being left on plane - BBC.com
articles.description: Mittens was flown three times between New Zealand and Australia after being forgotten in a plane's cargo hold.
articles.content:
A cat has made three flights between New Zealand and Australia in just 24 hours after being forgotten on a plane.
Mittens, an eight-year-old Maine Coon, was booked to travel from Christchurch to Mel… [+1963 chars]
